issues.description: The solutionâ€™s Lecture constructor parameter order (lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents) does not follow the attribute order specified in the UML diagram (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors). This mismatch will confuse students and cause the constructor tests to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the constructor signature to match the UML order: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors), and assign fields in that same order.
